trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee hopes to bring a touch of opulence to Lyhe Mheg.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a shiny pebble southeast of the Bookman's Shelves.
TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the shiny pebble to Uin Nee.

TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_UINNEE_000_000<tab>Rubies! Emeralds! Sapphires! Oh, how they sparkle! Not that we have many chances to see them here in Il Mheg. From what I hear, they're very valuable, which must be why the scavengers work so hard to dig them up.
TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_UINNEE_000_001<tab>That's given me another brilliant idea! We should decorate Lyhe Mheg with jewels of our own!
TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Of course, we don't need to go through all the trouble of finding real gemstones, just something with a vague resemblance. Our magic will do the rest!
TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_UINNEE_000_003<tab>You look like you've got time to spare. Why don't you make yourself useful and collect some nice, shiny pebbles for me?
TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_UINNEE_000_004<tab>There should be some down by the lake. And if you see any Fuath, give them a whack from me!

TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Well, it's a bit plain, but I suppose it'll do. I might even be able to turn pebbles like these into gold coins, so the children can see how it feels to be rich!

TEXT_BANPIX116_03704_UINNEE_000_022<tab>Of course, it will all disappear when they wake up, but they can enjoy it while the dream lasts. Even if they're penniless in real life, they'll live like royalty in Lyhe Mheg!
